name: Houseplant Sweater
description:
If you can have sweaters for your dog, you can have a sweater for your houseplant. COME ON.

So I've created a grey cabled cotton houseplant sweater, with cuff, fitted perfectly over a cream ceramic pot. The pot and sweater are designed to hold a 3.5" plastic potted plant -- the inner plastic pot and plant (which you provide) will not leak through the outer ceramic pot and sweater (which I provide) (you're welcome).

I think we get the point here. Cute AND functional, that's what we're talking about.
